title: Morning Joe 6/29/21
description: Officials assured residents of the Miami Beach-area condo that collapsed last week that their building was safe, despite a report that strongly indicated otherwise, while also disregarding residents' concerns that nearby construction might compromise the stability of the beachside high-rise.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Officials assured residents of the Miami Beach-area condo that collapsed last week that their building was safe, despite a report that strongly indicated otherwise, while also disregarding residents' concerns that nearby construction might compromise the stability of the beachside high-rise.
